data.text: Wach Jehova Nyasaye mane obiro ne Joel wuod Pethuel.
Winjuru ma, un jodongo;
Nyis nyithindu wachni,
Gik ma mony mar bonyo oweyo,
Un jomer, chiewuru kendo ywaguru!
Oganda moro osemonjo pinya, en oganda maratego
Oselwero it mzabibu maga,
Ywaguru ka ukuyo ka dhako ma pod tin ma orwakore gi law kuyo,
Chiwo mag cham kod misango miolo piny
Puothe okethore,
Kik ugen gimoro un jopur,
Mzabibu osetwo
Yaye un jodolo, rwakreuru gi pien gugru kuywak;
Landuru lemo gi riyo kech maler
Mano kaka odiechiengno lich!
Donge chiemo osegol oko e nyim wang ºwa;
Kothe otop
Mano kaka dhok chur!
In ema aluongi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Koda ka le mag thim bende tangni ka dwari nikech
